review_data.title: Liebenswürdig und köstlich
review_data.content: Sehr sympathische und kompetente Bedienung. Ein sehr gelungenes Sortiment einwandfreier Speisen. Unter anderem der Beste Käsekuchen (Schweiz: Quarkkuchen). Auch für...More

review_data.title: Good place, terrible service
review_data.content: So the place is cozy but it really doesn't mean anything when you can't relax because the waitress is being utterly arrogant. She was rude without a reason and will speak only German to you... Do not recommend for tourists.

review_data.title: Cooles Selbstbedienungsrestaurant.
review_data.content: Cooles Selbstbedienungsrestaurant. Freundlicher Service. Gesundes und gutes Angebot- Salat war sehr gut, Suppe okay. Geht alles sehr schnell.

review_data.title: Unfreundliches Personal!!"
review_data.content: War nur 2 x dort: das erste und letzte mal. Sehr unmotiviertes und unfreundliches deutsches Personal.

review_data.title: Very cozy, original and central cafe
review_data.content: Very cozy, original and central cafe with a great atmosphere! Staff were so friendly and super helpful in offering advice.

review_data.title: Nice... but severe service issues..
review_data.content: A really nice and cosy concept right in the main street. Unfortunately utterly rude German girl serving, with no idea how to speak to people nor managing her tasks properly. Fully forgot our pre-paid order, even though there were not more than 6-7 people in...More

review_data.title: Very cool foodie store
review_data.content: This place was amazing! Loved the delicious juices and enjoyed exploring the various elements the store had to offer. Staff were so so friendly and super helpful in offering advice. Such a variety of options for yummy breakfasts and lunches... a great, clean, vibey atmosphere!

review_data.title: Tolles, umweltbewusstes "Kafi" im Herzen von Zürich
review_data.content: Neu eröffnet mit komplett neuem Konzept! Top Service, sehr freundliche Mitarbeiter, regionale und Schweizer Produkte und sehr leckerer Kaffee.
